title.rendered: Stephane Rolland. SS 2023 during Haute Couture Week.

content.rendered:
Stephane Rolland. SAUDADE MEU AMOR Spring Summer 2023 Couture Collection during Haute Couture Week.

A few musical notes from Antonio Carlos Jobm and Maria Bethanias voice on a sunrise off the bay of Rio.

An hommage in three acts to Orfeu Negro, Marcel Camuss masterpiece, transposition of Orpheus and Eurydices myth in a fantasized Brazil with a tangible realism.

Through this voyage, from Bossa Nova to the prayers, from minimalism to abundance, Stphane Rolland collects the extremes to find a new balance.


Text and Photo: Press Stephane Rolland

More on: www.stephanerolland.com @stephanerolland_paris

Thanks: DM Media PR @dmmediapr


By Senior Fashion Editor 24FashionTV: Christina V Henningstad @christina_henningstad
